user_instruction: 'Send an update to Sarah (sarah@beaconofhope.org) about our latest intervention strategies. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Latest Intervention Strategies Update

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me an update on our latest intervention strategies? You can gather the relevant details from your Notion workspace and email the overview to sarah@beaconofhope.org.

Thanks in advance for your help—I appreciate it!

Best,
Sarah

final_output:
